about_the_game: My name is General Geoff Deadright, and welcome aboard. You've been recruited as one of the only civilians capable of helping annihilate the threat we call the Zombot Outbreak As you're well aware, life is more difficult than ever, as more and more people, owning the D0K-Chip , become affected. These several rooms are designed to help you become combat ready for the real deal. Do you have what it takes? Head through these rooms and show me what you got, soldier.
detailed_description: My name is General Geoff Deadright, and welcome aboard. You've been recruited as one of the only civilians capable of helping annihilate the threat we call the Zombot Outbreak As you're well aware, life is more difficult than ever, as more and more people, owning the D0K-Chip , become affected. These several rooms are designed to help you become combat ready for the real deal. Do you have what it takes? Head through these rooms and show me what you got, soldier.
name: Dead Dock Protocol Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3-4150, Ryzen 3 1200
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Introducing Dead Dock Protocol, a thrilling cyberpunk zombie shooter packed with intense, neon-blood-soaked action! Embark on a crucial mission to rescue six besieged city zones from the clutches of Zombots and their formidable bosses.
